column4: My internet is _really_ slow in Ubuntu 11.04, dual boot windows 7 is 10-20x faster so I know it's not my network or ISP
sorry it takes me forever to respond. I assumed it was a driver issue, is there a way to use a different driver in Ubuntu without getting a seperate NIC
run:   sudo lshw -C network     you will see the network chip and the driver used and you can hunt for guides
